author: Reuters Editorial
title: Diebold Nixdorf Q4 Loss Per Share $1.43
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Diebold Nixdorf Inc:
* DIEBOLD NIXDORF REPORTS 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 GAAP REVENUE INCREASED 0.5% TO $1.2 BILLION * QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $1.43 * QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE INCLUDED A ONE-TIME CHARGE OF APPROXIMATELY $95 MILLION ASSOCIATED WITH THE NEW U.S. TAX LAW
* COMPANY INTRODUCES OUTLOOK FOR 2018 * SEE FY 2018 TOTAL REVENUE $4.5 BILLION - $4.7 BILLION
* SEES 2018 LOSS PER SHARE $0.80 TO $0.50 * SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.00 TO $1.30 * QTRLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.40 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.35, REVENUE VIEW $1.21 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.35, REVENUE VIEW $4.61 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
